version_description:
• Minor improvements
• More current loan balances*
• Simplifies payment steps for personal loans and lines of credit

* Varies by product. Refer to contextual help icons in your Mobile Banking App for more details on what is included in your loan/line Outstanding Balance.

Minor improvements

Troubleshooting: Issues with opening the app
• Make sure the M&T Bank app is closed. If it is open, double click the home button, swipe until you find the M&T Bank app, and swipe up on the M&T Bank app to close it.
• Open the iOS Settings app, scroll down to find the M&T Bank app settings
• Select M&T Bank, and ensure the Clear All App Data option is toggled on.
• Re-Open the M&T Bank app.

Add a payee and make bill payments to almost anyone

Troubleshooting: Issues with opening the app
• Make sure the M&T Bank app is closed. If it is open, double click the home button, swipe until you find the M&T Bank app, and swipe up on the M&T Bank app to close it.
• Open the iOS Settings app, scroll down to find the M&T Bank app settings
• Select M&T Bank, and ensure the Clear All App Data option is toggled on.
• Re-Open the M&T Bank app.

Minor improvements
Minor Improvements
Minor improvements.

- Optimized for Face ID.
- Additional minor improvements.
Bug fixes for viewing mortgage details.
Minor Improvements

• Sign up for and manage your M&T Alerts right through the app
• Introducing a new way to receive M&T Alerts; mobile app notifications
Minor Improvements.

• Sign up for and manage your M&T Alerts right through the app
• Introducing a new way to receive M&T Alerts; mobile app notifications
Minor Improvements.

▪ Added capabilities supporting the introduction of M&T’s new Business Credit Card (available to all business customers in June)
▪ Minor updates to M&T Alerts for pending debit transactions
▪ Display improvements for select loan products
Minor improvements
Minor Improvements

Introducing Zelle®
•Send money from an eligible checking or saving account using a U.S. mobile number or email address
•Send money to almost anyone with a bank account in the U.S.

• Order Replacement Debit Cards and Credit Cards (Personal accounts only)
• Add Authorized Users to your Credit Card Account (Personal and Business accounts)

• Manage Payees for Bill Pay - Ability to edit and delete payees
• Business Users can now manage their Personal credit cards
• Report Lost or Stolen Debit Cards and Credit Cards (Personal accounts only)
Minor Improvements
Minor Improvements
Bug fixes for viewing mortgage details.
Send payment requests to a U.S. mobile number or email address enrolled with Zelle®.

Enhancements to the Mobile Check Deposit experience.
- Introducing M&T Flash Funds – a feature that offers eligible users the option to deposit qualifying checks with immediate availability, for a fee.

• Introducing M&T Money Smart™, the convenient, all-in-one money management tool.
• Organize all your accounts in one place, track and categorize spending, and set savings goals and budgets.

▪ Minor Fixes and Enhancements.
▪ Mobile Check Deposit bug fixes for iOS 13.
Minor Fixes and Enhancements
Minor Improvements
Bug fixes and Minor Enhancements

• Improved enrollment, account access, and card management.
• Specific bug fixes implemented for an enhanced experience.
We’ve enhanced security features, made it easier to manage your M&T credit and debit cards, and updated our contact hours for personal service.

Thank you for banking with M&T Mobile Banking! We are always looking to improve on our digital solutions and work to further enhance the mobile experience in each app update.

Updates include:
• Bug fixes and minor enhancements

Thank you for banking with M&T Mobile Banking. We are always looking to improve on our digital solutions and work to further enhance the mobile experience in each app update.

The updated version includes:
• A new feature that allows you to designate a mobile phone number and/or device as “primary” to ensure you receive information at your preferred contact 
• Security enhancements to help prevent fraudulent money movement transactions
• Updated messaging to reflect improvements in the Business Banking enrollment process
• Minor bug fixes to help you better manage your cards digitally

Thank you for banking with M&T Mobile Banking. We are always looking to improve our digital solutions and make it an even better experience for you.

The updated version includes:
• A feature that allows you to designate a mobile phone number and/or device as “primary” to ensure you receive information at your preferred contact 
• New messaging to provide more clarity as you move money
• Minor fixes to improve the display and how you can interact with the app
• Enhanced security monitoring to help keep you protected

Thank you for banking with M&T Mobile Banking. We are always looking to improve our digital solutions and make it an even better experience for you.

Latest update coming in September:
• New security alerts for your personal debit and credit card(s) and business credit card(s), to help protect you and your accounts

Thank you for choosing M&T Mobile Banking. We are always enhancing our digital solutions to help you bank when, where, and how you want.

The updated version includes:
• The ability to easily make an appointment to meet over the phone or in-person to review your personal or business accounts, lending options, credit card options, and more
• Other minor fixes and updates

Thank you for using M&T Mobile Banking. Our updated version includes new features to help make your banking experience even better.

This latest version includes:
• New security alerts for your personal and business card(s) to help protect you and your accounts
• Ability for you to provide us with your feedback and rate your experience within the app
• Other minor fixes and updates
